mapper.insert: insert into order_v (id, order_no, userid, areaid, startTime, location, price, useTime, payment, paymentTime, paystatus, createTime, updateTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{usetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paymenttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},now(), now())
mapper.update: update order_v set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, areaid = #{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, useTime = #{usetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment = #{payment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paymentTime = #{paymenttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, paystatus = #{paystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, order_no, userid, areaid, startTime, location, price, useTime, payment, paymentTime, paystatus, createTime, updateTime from order_v where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, order_no, userid, areaid, startTime, location, price, useTime, payment, paymentTime, paystatus, createTime, updateTime from order_v
select * from order_v where userid = #{userId} order by createTime
